column5: Nissan Motor Co Ltd and Daimler AG were scrambling late on Sunday after China's annual consumer rights day TV show said the firms oversold repairs and spare parts to drivers.

column3: stroke seen with newest Edwards TAVR system -study March 15 Researchers on Sunday presented trial data showing very low mortality and stroke rates using the third generation version of Edwards Lifesciences Corp's  non-invasive heart valve replacement system that could help support its U.S. approval.
